letters.description: Assess the couple's current intimacy landscape and identify specific emotional or physical blockages.
Identify and translate individual intimacy needs and communication styles for better mutual understanding.
Guide partners through structured disclosure exercises to rebuild trust and emotional transparency.
Incorporate non-sexual touch and sensory awareness to bridge the physical gap between partners.
Teach tools for managing physiological triggers and maintaining safety during moments of conflict.
Design sustainable intimacy rituals that integrate these new behaviors into the couple's daily lifestyle.
